text: The men's shot put event at the 1991 Summer Universiade was held at the Don Valley Stadium in Sheffield on 21 July 1991. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Aleksandr Klimenko '''' |Matt Simson '''' |Jordan Reynolds '''' |} ==Results== ===Final=== Final results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
